name: The Bricks Break Out Ball Game Lite
name_original: The Bricks Break Out Ball Game Lite
description:
**** Warning **** Extremely Addictive **** ABSOLUTELY FREE ***

We promise you that this is one of the best app you have downloaded so far .

Get 48 Levels FREE in this latest Bricks Break Out Ball Game. WITH UNIQUE nvidia Physics engine integrated .

FEATURES:
• Sharper, enhanced HD graphics.
• 48 free addictive levels
• Boost Indicator: You control the speed of the game – the faster the ball goes the more points you receive!
• Rocking Sounds with sharp picture quality
• Fire Ball, Acid Ball, Splitting Ball, Grenade Ball.
• Exploding bricks, Mystery Bricks, x4 bricks and much much more
• Power-ups.
• Game Center Support – View your friends’ scores and achievements, no matter where they live!
• Save and restore games in-progress.
• Stylish Animation with Addictive Game play
